titles: The letters whyche Iohan Ashwell priour of Newnham Abbey besydes Bedforde, sente secretely to the Byshope of Lyncolne in the yeare of our Lord M.D.xxvii. Where in the sayde pryour accuseth George Ioye that tyme beyng felow of Peter college in Cambrydge, of fower opinyons: wyth the answere of the sayde George vn to the same opynyons.
author: Joye, George, d. 1553.
Ashwell, John, d. 1541?
publisher: Printed by T. Raynald and W. Hill?,
notes: Dated at end: At Strassburge the .10. daye of Iune.
Identified as STC 844 on UMI microfilm reel 21.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 21 (British Library copy) at reel 127 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
